name: RemoveSellerLead
description: This endpoint permanently deletes a seller previously invited to the marketplace, if the seller has not already accepted the invitation.

accountName.description: Name of the VTEX account that belongs to the marketplace.

environment.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL.

sellerLeadId.description: ID of the Seller Lead invited to the marketplace.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

Content-Type.description: Type of the content being sent.
